eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.impl
Class LocalEngineControl

java.lang.Object
  eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.impl.LocalEngineControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AdvanceEngineControl
public class LocalEngineControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdvanceEngineControl

A synchronized local flow engine control object storing data in local XML file.

May be used to test GUI without the need to connect to real remote data source.

Author:
akarnokd, 2011.09.20.

                                                                                                 AdvanceControlException
Description copied from interface: AdvanceEngineControl
Return the compilation result of the given realm. This function may be used to find out why a server-side verification failed or to query the compilation result after a flow upload and realm startup.

Specified by:
queryCompilationResult in interface AdvanceEngineControl
Parameters:
realm - the realm to query
Returns:
the compilation result or null if no compilation was performed since the last startup of the engine

AdvanceControlException - if the user is not allowed to read a flow
